typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCMoviesRaw
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VAMoviesRaw
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRMoviesRaw
SRMoviesRaw select(mapColumn(
		Category = genre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
VAMoviesRaw select(mapColumn(
		Category
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
FCMoviesRaw select(mapColumn(
		Category
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3, Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Select4 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(Category),
	CategoryCount = count(Category)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		Category
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
SurrogateKey sink(input(
		{02e7ebe8-e09c-40f5-ba46-ab465bd0f73f} as string,
		Kelemen as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{5555550673} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000004} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000005} as string,
		SR as string,
		{3d034f2a-b657-4c80-b312-6adb8e1c99b8} as string,
		{155 Pine St} as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Portland as string,
		OR as string,
		{85101} as string,
		{1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MovieCategory
